root.name: 3D Deathchase
root.description: 3D Deathchase has the player riding a cycle through a forest chasing other cycles and trying to shoot them. There are also helicopters, tanks and night levels later on. Â Influential in Britain, the game has inspired modern titles - Playstation Home's XI section has a Deathchase homage, and iphone games Dead Runner and Dark Rider are clear homages to this title.
